page.title: 14BUSINESSES 2.
page.content: {VETERINARY SURGEONS. I.H. Sergeant and J.P. Oliver Ms.R.C.V.S. Surgery hours 9.-9.30 a.m. 2-2.30 p.m. 6-7.30 p.m. On call 24 hours all year. The oldest veterinary practice in North Wales. Number of people working in the practice 5. Number of animals treated per week 1,000(max) Facilities include{ Operating room, {X-ray dark room, lambing room, waiting {and consulting room,Office,Laboratory. As many pets as farm animals are treated. Most unusual job.{Stitching up a cow {in the middle of the river Mersey. Most unusual animal treated:{ {Alligator. }
